docs.title: Welcome to the Massive Melt Media Unity 6 Tutorials
docs.text: This site contains tutorials, code examples, and asset documentation for Unity and C++ game projects.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
• Visit getting started to set up your project.
  • Explore gameplay guides for example mechanics.
  • Check assets for prefab & asset reference.
  • See code examples for Unity/C++ snippets.
  • Need help? Look at troubleshooting.
  • Egg Salad Bing Bong

docs.title: Commands (MkDocs)
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] — Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve — Start live preview.
  • mkdocs build — Build the site.
  • mkdocs gh-deploy — Deploy to GitHub Pages.
